channel.title: How do I play on a Client on my Mac?
channel.description: Please be mature, don't just respond Mac's suck you fucktard (Lol, Oh the irony?) I've been able to get the Moparscape client working, but idhtf to get the client to work, help would be appreciated.

item.title: How do I play on a Client on my Mac?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Just because you said it “Mac’s suck!!”, Alright, but there is a client and server released for mac. Here is the link.

317 = http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,401532.0.html
508 = http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402045.0.html

I believe those are the only 2 released on here for a mac.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I play on a Client on my Mac?
